title: Samsung’s on a roll, brings Android 12 with One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy A22 4G and Galaxy A41
content:
Amidst all the talk about Android 13, some people forget that OEMs are still working on updating their smartphones to Android 12. Samsung, for example, has upgraded a bunch of Galaxy devices to Android 12 with the company’s own One UI 4.1 skin on top in the last few weeks. Now, two more Galaxy A

The post Samsung’s on a roll, brings Android 12 with One UI 4.1 to the Galaxy A22 4G and Galaxy A41 appeared first on XDA.
description: Samsung has begun rolling out the One UI 4.1 update to the Galaxy A22 4G and Galaxy A41 on top of Android 12. Read on to know more!
